quote.text: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
quote.author: Audre Lorde

scripture.text: For I am convinced that neither death nor life, neither angels nor demons, neither the present nor the future... nor anything else in all creation, will be able to separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

message:
Hey there Ms. Sunshine ☀️💛

I prayed for you Last night... Not just for your protection in the typical way, but in every layer of what safety really means for you... I pray for your joy to be guarded. For your smile to have constant reasons to show up... For your peace to sit quietly beside you, even when life gets chaotic.

Safety, for you, is so much more than physical... it’s emotional steadiness, spiritual alignment, and daily reminders that you're loved by Heavenly Father... And I trust God with every bit of your heart, because His love never stops pursuing you.

You're doing more than you realize... You’re walking through each season like you were made for it.. and truthfully, you are. I see that. I honor it.

I’m proud of you as always. And as always you mean the world to me💖
